query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		declarativepolicy {
			_id,
			complies_with_standard_ineligible_findings,
			contact_email,
			created_at,
			has_open_scope,
			id,
			introduction,
			pays_within_one_month,
			platform_standards_exclusions,
			protected_by_gold_standard_safe_harbor,
			standard_ineligible_findings_exclusions,
			updated_at,
		}
	}
